full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 91 of 262 1796 LC8VMAX4 Hesse - direct 1 THE COURT: Thank you. You may turn to 3E. 2 Q. Thank you, Mrs. Hesse. Do you have 3E? 3 A. Yes, I do. 4 Q. Thank you. 5 So my only question about this exhibit is, is the first name of the person who left this message Carolyn, C-A-R-O-L-Y-N? 6 7 THE COURT: Are you directing to a particular message? 8 9 MS. MOE: Yes. 10 Q. Do you see a message on there that has the name Carolyn on it, Mrs. Hesse? 11 12 A. Yes, I do. It's in the bottom corner on the right. 13 Q. And is that spelled C-A-R-O-L-Y-N? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. Thank you, Mrs. Hesse. 16 On the days that you worked at the Palm Beach house -- 17 THE COURT: Jurors can put the binders down. 18 Thank you. 19 MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor. 20 Q. Mrs. Hesse, on the days that you worked at the Palm Beach house, were Maxwell and Epstein home? 21 22 A. No. 23 Q. Was your job to work there while they were away? 24 A. That's correct. 25 Q. Did you work full-time? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013369
